title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 40-2.52 - Community environmental health and food protection; performance standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 40-2.52 - Community environmental health and food protection; performance standards

State Regulations

The local health department shall maintain a program that ensures that facilities operated pursuant to Parts 6, 7, 14, 15 and 17 of the State Sanitary Code comply with all relevant provisions of the State Sanitary Code and the Public Health Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
40-2.52

Amended, New

York State Register December 31, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
